name: EDIS Mengenal Huruf
description: The dyslexia have inability in language that influenced the reading , writing , listened to and talked and so the same dyslexia very difficult to speaking, Irregular while reading something and could not write with well and on. Needed a medium learning special to help improve a generation of kids able dyslexia especially their ability to speak, where the basis for the ability speaking is the introduction of a letter of the alphabet. Writer to design a media learning named "EDIS Mengenal Huruf"  that can be used to help learning the introduction of the alphabet for the dyslexia. The result could be achieved is "EDIS  Mengenal Huruf" application, that can be used as a means of learning the alphabet for a child dyslexia. Learning the alphabet packed with attractive and exciting to be studied for the dyslexia. Media uses learning provide a positive effect on ability to the dyslexia in know and understand the alphabet. Conclusions got to create educative game that can become one of the facilities for learning to improve the ability to speak for the dyslexia.
